relationships.evidence_text: Today we are visiting with Professor and author David George Haskell.

And then you went on and did your graduate work at Cornell.

birds of course structured their societies and communicate to one another mostly through acoustic means.
So that was my initial foray, if you like, into the sonic world of other species.
